programme.desc: In Sun Chung's first film for the Shaw Brothers, a 'devil girl' turns one clan against another to acquire two powerful magic mirrors.

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A country bumpkin's day of reckoning arrives when he vows to bring down the man who killed his father's best friend.

programme.title: Heads for Sale

programme.title: Wits of the Brats

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: Wang Yu grows from a playful boy to a reformation hero against the Ching Dynasty, rising to protect his homeland and loved ones.

programme.title: Asia-pol

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po and Chin Han return with a Huangmei Opera classic, depicting a loving couple whose marriage is being poisoned by the husband's stepmother.

programme.title: Diau Charn

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II

programme.desc: This epic classic charts a romance between two teenage cousins, who pursue their relationship despite objections from their respective families.

programme.title: Ode to Gallantry

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager's use of the Boxers to remove the foreign powers from China yields unexpected results. Starring Alexander Fu.

programme.title: Mrs K

programme.title: Young & Fabulous

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows

programme.title: Street Kings
programme.desc: LAPD detective traces the killer who murdered his old partner amid a cloud of corruption.

programme.title: Like Crazy
programme.desc: A British college student falls for an American student but finds out that they have to be separated.

programme.title: Apollo 11
programme.desc: Crafted from a newly discovered trove of 65mm footage, and more than 11,000 hours of uncatalogued audio recordings, Apollo 11 takes us straight to the heart of NASA's most celebrated mission.

programme.title: The Outpost
programme.desc: A true story of heroism about the battle of Kamdesh in Afghanistan, where 54 soldiers were surrounded by 400 Taliban insurgents at the deadliest military outpost in the world.

programme.title: Superman: Red Son
programme.desc: Superman crash-lands in Cold War-era Russia instead of rural Kansas and American scientist Lex Luthor attempts to destroy the alien Soviet threat. What follows might leave humanity's fate hanging.

programme.title: Memoirs of a Geisha
programme.desc: When a young girl is sold to a geisha house, she embarks on a lifelong journey which sees her blossoming into the legendary geisha, Sayuri.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: A veteran shuttle pilot embarks on a dangerous one-shot space mission to prevent a giant comet from colliding with the Earth.

programme.title: Just Go With it
programme.desc: A man enlists the help of a woman and her kids to land the woman of his dreams.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: Superman returns after five years in space to find Lois engaged and Lex Luthor with a sinister plan that will endanger America.
